title: Chapter 951 - You Owe Me A Life
volume_title: A Sword Cleaves A Path Through The Netherworld
body:
Chapter 951 - You Owe Me A Life

The Timekeeper.

Even cultivators who lived in the City of Eternal Night year-round seldom knew of this mysterious old man’s existence.

Those who did know of him practically never revealed anything about him.

This was a naturally formed, unspoken rule, and it had stood throughout the ages.

Wang Chonglu would never have guessed that a young Spiritual Revolution cultivator would know about the Timekeeper.

But before long, he understood.

A young man traveling alone with an Unsinkable Boat almost certainly had a peak orthodoxy behind him. It was entirely possible that he had an extremely powerful backer.

It wasn’t actually at all strange that a young man like that would know about the Timekeeper.

“If you know about the Timekeeper, that makes this simple.” As he spoke, Wang Chonglu took a jade slip from his sleeves and passed it to Su Yi. “Here, hold onto this.”

However, Su Yi shook his head. “You’d best give it to him yourself.”

Wang Chonglu snorted coldly. “What, are you worried this will bring trouble upon you?”

Su Yi’s gaze was calm and inscrutable. “No, I just think you’ll make it to the City of Eternal Night...
original_title: Chapter 951 - You Owe Me a Life
